attributes.action: stop the golden handshake of circa £60k being paid to those discredited and disgraced MPs who have overclaimed on their expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that those discredited and disgraced MPs who have overclaimed on their expenses and are standing down at the forthcoming General Election, should NOT receive their Golden Handshake of circa £60k

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
